title: Interpretation of a dream about cutting off a bird’s wing

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about cutting a bird's wing in a dream. ... can be an indication of bad things, and God is greater and more knowledgeable. In the event that a pregnant woman sees herself cutting a bird's wing, this may indicate some difficulties, and God knows best. When the dreamer sees himself cutting a bird's wing, it may express his cruelty to his children, and God is greater and more knowledgeable. Seeing a bird's wing being cut can also represent cruelty to children, and God knows the unseen. Interpretation of a dream about a dead person raising birds in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about a dead person raising birds in a dream. We did not find clear concepts to see this, except that seeing birds can lead to success in trade, and God knows the unseen. If a married woman sees birds, it may mean profit, and God knows best. When a single girl sees birds, it expresses goodness and happiness, God willing. Interpretation of a dream about a bird attacking me in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about a bird attacking me in a dream can be a sign of exposure to trouble, and God knows best. When I see a bird attacking me with a repetition of the dream, it may indicate haters, and God knows best. If a married man sees a bird attacking him, it may indicate a problem, and God knows best. As for the dreamer, if he sees blood, it may indicate the invalidity of his dream, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about seeing the dead in the form of a bird in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about seeing the dead in the form of a bird in a dream. Seeing the dead can also indicate the dreamer’s failure in his rights, and God knows best. When you see the dead, it indicates goodness and happiness, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about hungry birds in a dream. Seeing birds means goodness and happiness, God willing. If a married man sees a large bird, it may mean comfort and peace, and God knows best. Seeing a large bird can also express his liberation from distress, and God Almighty is All-Knowing. title: What is the interpretation of eggplant in a dream according to Ibn Sirin?

preview.html: Eggplant in a dreamEggplant is a type of vegetable, distinguished by its black and white color, and is distinguished by its various benefits, vision, follow us. Eggplant in a dream Interpretation scholars believe that seeing eggplant in a dream indicates a good life for the dreamer, if its color is black. Also, seeing the dreamer in a dream eating eggplant, It means achieving goals and ambitions and reaching the desired goal. As for seeing the view in a dream other than the time of its harvest, it shows the hatred and envy that he carries within himself towards others. If you see eggplant at the same time, it means that you will achieve many goals and ambitions. If an unmarried girl sees it, Fresh eggplant in a dream, this foretells that she will soon establish a close relationship with a suitable person. Seeing the dreamer’s eggplant and a frying pan in a dream indicates the many blessings that will make you happy, the short rest that you will get, and abundant food. Eggplant in a dream by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin says that eggplant in a dream It indicates the exhausting worries and sorrows that the dreamer will suffer from in her life. Also, seeing eggplant in a dream indicates anxiety and intense fear in life and constant preoccupation with many issues. If the dreamer sees in a dream eggplant in its season, it foretells the great success and superiority that it will achieve, its coming, and its abundant nutrition. As for the dreamer who sees in his dream an eggplant that is not in season, it symbolizes exposure to many problems and the appearance of bad news in the coming period. If the dreamer sees a large black eggplant in a dream, this indicates the false statements that he will hear about himself from an evil person. Also, Mrs. Whoever sees huge black eggplant in a dream means that she will be exposed to problems and obstacles. If the dreamer sees in a dream that he is eating eggplant with a bad taste, this indicates sadness and unhappiness in life. What is the interpretation of seeing eggplant in a single woman’s dream? If an unmarried girl sees eggplant in a dream, This is good news that her husband will get close to the right person who will be the reason for her happiness. Also, seeing the dreamer eating eggplant in a dream symbolizes getting a prestigious job soon, from which she will earn a lot of money. Seeing an engaged girl in a dream eating eggplant, means that she is thinking In those days of separation from her partner. The dreamer, if she sees long white eggplant in a dream, indicates that she will get what she wants and will connect with her life partner. Seeing eggplant in a dream indicates good nutrition and abundance that you will have in your professional or personal life. But If a girl eats eggplant in a dream in large quantities, this indicates that her desires and aspirations will soon come true. Seeing eggplant in a dream means that you will soon hear good news and enjoy the best news. Seeing a girl cooking eggplant in a dream symbolizes soon connecting with a person whose attitude is simple, but who will work For happiness. What does eggplant mean in a dream for a married woman? If a married woman sees eggplant

title: Interpretation of a dream about fire in a relative’s house by Ibn Sirin and senior scholars

preview.html: All you are looking for is to know the interpretation of a dream about a fire in a relative’s house. The interpretation of a dream about a fire in a relative’s house in a dream does not bode well in most cases, and jurists said that fire and the outbreak of fire in a dream indicate dozens of signs that we will explain at length in the following lines. You have a dream that confuses you. You are waiting for it. .. Google is an Egyptian site for interpreting dreams. Interpretation of a dream of a fire in a relative’s house. Interpretation of a dream of a fire in a relative’s house can indicate something good or bad, according to different details that can be seen in the dream, which are as follows: Fire and hearing the sound of fire: One of the worst visions to see. In a dream, the dreamer sees a relative’s house burning, the fire is making terrifying sounds, and the people of the house are screaming and asking for help from the residents of neighboring houses. A severe misfortune increases their sadness and sense of anguish and pain. Black smoke from a fire: The abundance of black smoke in a burning house is a sign of great destruction in that house and unfortunately they will be affected by it for a long time. Perhaps a family member will be imprisoned or someone may be affected by a violent disease. Smoke White from fire: If the dreamer saw the house of one of his aunts or uncles burning, but the smoke was white and did not suffocate anyone in the house, then this is victory and a lot of money. A fire broke out in a house without casualties: When the dreamer sees this dream, knowing that the fire did not make a sound High and that all the furniture and furnishings of the house were not affected by the power of fire, the dream at that time indicates goodness and happiness in that house such as a marriage, and they may have a problem, but it ends without any consequences. Fire and comprehensive destruction of the house: When the dreamer dreams that the house of one of his relatives has been destroyed. It burned to the ground. This is a serious disaster, and God forbid, it will happen to the people of this house, as a major problem will arise between the husband and wife, which will lead to their separation and the destruction of the good relationship that existed between them. There is no doubt that this destruction will be a cause of the destruction of the lives of the children. Interpretation of a dream about a fire in a relative’s house, according to Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin said Sirin: A fire in a relative’s house is a sign of a serious dispute between its members, and the dreamer may be one of the parties to this dispute. We will explain the interpretation of many visions of this dream in the following points: House fire and moving to a better house: If the house of the dreamer’s uncle or one of his relatives burned down and the house looked like a piece of flame, but the people of the house moved to another house that was wider and more beautiful than before, then the vision means There has been a radical change in their lives since then. You will be exposed to a major problem. This means that God will reward them for their patience and make them happy after being sad for a long time. A fire in the house and the death of a person: This vision indicates a crisis that the household is suffering from, and one of them will fall victim to it and may die as a result of severe shock. Family members sustain minor injuries due to the fire: This dream indicates superficial effects and small sorrows suffered by the people of the burning house after God tested them by testing their money or health. They will be strong and able to face the crisis that will find them soon. House fire and the sound of rippling in the house: the appearance of symbols of humiliation by fire.

title: Interpretation of cleaning the bathroom in a dream by Ibn Sirin, the correct and comprehensive interpretation

preview.html: Here is an explanation of cleaning the toilet in a dream. It is one of the frequent visions, despite its strangeness, but many are still ignorant of its meaning and interpretation, and it contains many symbols and signs. Therefore, in our article today, we will clarify the meaning of cleaning the toilet in dreams for both Ibn Sirin and Ibn Shaheen, and the difference in interpretation for both married women and pregnant women. And the single woman and the dream of a man in detail in the encyclopedia, follow us. Interpretation of cleaning the bathroom in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin believes that bathing in a dream is not a dream worthy of praise, but rather it is one of the bad and ugly dreams that befall the dreamer if he is dirty. If the dreamer dreams of an abandoned or broken bathroom in In his dream, this is an indication that he will become very tired in his life, so that the path he is walking on is very tiring, arduous, and full of difficulties and obstacles. The broken dove according to Ibn Sirin is a sign of sadness, anxiety, and depression that afflicts the dreamer. As for entering the dove itself, if it is clean, tidy, and shiny in a dream The dreamer, this indicates kindness and following a large and broad diet of the law. As for the priest entering the bathroom during his sleep, and this bathroom is pure and smells good, and it relieved his need, this was a relief from the worry and anguish that the priest suffered from for a long time, except God. He wanted to remove pain and remove worry and sadness, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. As for bathing in general, Ibn Sirin says, it is an indication of the imminent discovery of secrets, secrets, and hidden information, and it can be a sign of magic, fatigue, and illness. It is also said that a clean bath in a dream is good for removing worries and healing from Diseases, God willing. Interpretation of cleaning the bathroom for unmarried women. If an unmarried woman sees in her dream a bathroom that is not clean or tidy and smells bad, this indicates her relationship with a person of bad reputation and reputation who is trying to take her and leave her in shame and scandal, then he must do so. be cerfull. If she cleans the bathroom with refreshing soap in a dream, this shows her love, satisfaction, and harmony with the nature of her life. But if she sees herself in a dream bathing with soap, this indicates a close marriage. Interpretation of cleaning the bathroom in a dream for a married woman: If a married woman sees herself in the bathroom cleaning it, This means that she is committing many sins, such as backbiting and gossiping, and she must repent, knowing that she is trying to do so. However, if she sees a dove in her dream, this indicates the doubt that worries her about her husband or the presence of a health problem on the dreamer’s path. Likewise, bathing in a married woman’s dream indicates To a lot of talk about her and hatred about her. But if a married woman sees in a dream that she is comforting herself, this means removing worries and diseases and solving problems. Cleaning the bathroom in a dream for a pregnant woman. If the toilet in a pregnant woman’s dream is clean and tidy, this is an indication of tremendous nourishment and goodness that will come. For the dreamer, in addition to the ease and comfort of her situation by God’s command. But if the bathroom in her dream was deserted, this indicates that her husband is eating forbidden and illegal money. In the event that the pregnant woman sees the bathroom

title: Interpretation of a dream about finding a lost little boy in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about finding a lost little child in a dream. In case you want to know the interpretation of a dream about finding a lost little child in a dream, and we found that it is one of the dreams that some people want to know its interpretation, let us look for the interpretations of the scholars working for this dream, and the reader will know that the site administrators do not With interpretations, rather they are from the heart. Interpretations of some scholars. Interpretation of a dream about finding a lost little boy in a dream. Seeing finding a lost little boy in a dream may indicate the end of the worries and sorrows that the dreamer faced in his life in the previous period. Dreaming about finding a lost little boy in the dream may indicate the end of the worries and sorrows that the dreamer faced in his life in the previous period. To reject the material crises that the dreamer has been suffering from for a long time. Seeing a small child in a dream may indicate the health and prosperity that the dreamer enjoys, and God knows best. When you see that a small child is missing in a dream, this indicates good skin and a broad diet that the dreamer will acquire during this period. Period, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about finding paper money and receiving it in a dream: It is possible that the vision of finding banknotes in a dream indicates some differences and problems that the dreamer may face in his life at that time. Whoever sees in a dream that he finds a banknote, this indicates Some changes may occur in the life of the dreamer during that period, and he must seek God’s help. A dream about finding paper money in a dream may indicate fears that the dreamer may face in his life during this period, and God knows best. If you see yourself taking paper money in a dream, This may indicate financial problems that the dreamer may face in his life during this time, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about finding blue banknotes and receiving them in a dream: Seeing yourself receiving blue banknotes in a dream may indicate the success and excellence that the dreamer enjoyed in his life during that time. Days. Whoever dreams of blue paper money in a dream may indicate that goals and ambitions will be achieved to a great extent during this period, and God knows best. It is possible that seeing blue paper money in a dream indicates that the dreamer is seeking to achieve his goals and ambitions to a great extent. It may be that Seeing finding blue paper money in a dream indicates some good changes occurring in one’s life during this time, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about finding gold in the sea in a dream: Anyone who dreams of finding gold in the sea in a dream may indicate great success that he may achieve. The dreamer is in his life at that time. Finding gold in the sea in a dream may indicate the challenges that the dreamer will face in those days, and God knows best. Anyone who dreams that they went to the sea and found gold in the dream may indicate the dreamer’s attempt to fulfill desires and dreams. Seeing finding gold in the sea in a dream means getting rid of the problem that the dreamer was facing and the happy events that will come to him, thanks to God. Interpretation of a dream about finding a dead person in a dream: Whoever saw that he found a dead body in a dream

title: Interpretation of seeing a chameleon in a dream according to major commentators

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a chameleon in a dream: The chameleon is considered an animal belonging to the reptile family that can devour everything that enters its mouth, including insects and small reptiles. It is found in abundance all over the world and usually lives in crevices. It is characterized by the presence of many species, including the tiger chameleon. And the skull, and the caisson, and many others. Today and until today, we will talk about various interpretations of seeing a chameleon in a dream for great males from married, pregnant, and divorced women. Interpretation of seeing a chameleon in a dream for a single girl: A single girl’s dream that she is raising a chameleon in a dream indicates that this girl will receive a lot of goodness, food, and blessings. If she dreams For one girl in a dream that there is a green chameleon in her house, this portends many good things. If an unmarried girl dreams that someone is giving her a gray chameleon, this means that this person likes her and will ask her to marry soon. But if an unmarried girl dreams that an unknown person brings A large number of chameleons to the house, this indicates her success and that she will reach a high position in life. If an unmarried girl dreams that a chameleon is sitting on the furniture of her house, this means that she will get rid of all the problems that worry her in life. But if an unmarried girl dreams that she You feed a chameleon in a dream, this means that this girl is compassionate and sympathetic. Interpretation of seeing a chameleon in a dream for a married woman: If a married woman dreams that she is petting a chameleon in her dream, this means that she is surrounded by good friends. If a married woman dreams of a chameleon in her bedroom, this indicates She will receive a lot of kindness and food in her life. As for seeing a chameleon drinking from a married woman’s shoe, this is good news about the dreamer’s life changing for the better. If a married woman dreams that she is offering food to a chameleon in a dream, this is evidence of the fulfillment of the desires she seeks in The dream. If a married woman dreams that her husband gives her a green chameleon, this means that his wife will give birth to a girl. If a married woman loves hearing the sound of a chameleon in her home, this indicates many good things that will happen to the woman, and God knows best. Interpretation of seeing a chameleon in a dream for a woman Divorced: If a divorced woman dreams that she sees a chameleon, this means that she will get a lot of food. But if a divorced woman dreams of a chameleon entering her house, this indicates a lot of goodness that will exist in this woman and in this house, God willing. As for her dream that she is raising a chameleon in The dream indicates that she will obtain a lot of goodness and money. If a divorced woman dreams that her ex-husband gives her a chameleon as a gift, this means that her ex-husband has hatred and malice towards her and she must beware of him because he may take revenge on her. If a divorced woman dreams that a chameleon is approaching her to harm her, then this It indicates the emergence of problems in her life, but these problems will be overcome soon. Interpretation of seeing a chameleon in a dream for a pregnant woman: The interpretation of a dream about a chameleon for a pregnant woman is as follows: If a pregnant woman dreams that she is sitting with

title: Interpretation of the dream of seeing cantaloupe in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Imam Al-Sadiq

preview.html: The secret of seeing watermelon in a dream lies in the abundance of goodness and happiness that comes to the dreamer. Perhaps the vision reflects a lot of money and success in business. Also, an unmarried woman eating watermelon in a dream is good news for marrying a person of good morals and religion. The taste of watermelon in a dream is good and a blessed life and successful deeds. Imam Ibn Sirin also explained seeing a watermelon in a dream, and he explained that he ate it in order to disappear anxiety and distress and get rid of life’s problems and worries, sour in dreams, sadness, and poor management in religion and faith. Seeing rotten watermelon in a dream dreams of the death of a loved one or loss of work. It is related to seeing watermelon in a dream in detail. Interpretation of a dream about watermelon by Ibn Sirin. Whoever sees in his dream that he is eating a yellow cantaloupe, it is evidence of his recovery from some of the diseases to which he is exposed. Sometimes yellow watermelon is a sign of distress and disappointment. Anyone who sees a lot of yellow watermelon is... An indication that the dreamer is a very humble person in a coin. Eating sweet watermelon indicates the disappearance of stress. Whoever sees himself drinking watermelon is evidence that he is doing many good deeds. Whoever thinks that he is eating cantaloupe is lying, this is evidence of poverty. The presence of watermelon in Home to many mistakes. Seeing watermelon in a dream indicates some fears and problems. Watermelon rind shows the characteristics of an unpleasant smell. Interpretation of a dream about watermelon for a single woman. Watermelon in a girl’s dream indicates the approach of her marriage. If you see watermelon with a delicious taste, this is a sign of the abundance of life. It indicates Seeing watermelon indicates goodness and blessings that the girl will receive. Sometimes watermelon in a girl’s dream is just an illusion. Interpretation of a dream about watermelon for a married woman. Being killed when he sees watermelon in a dream for a married woman is a sign of imminent pregnancy. Interpretation of a dream about watermelon for a pregnant womanIf a pregnant woman sees watermelon in a dream, this is evidence It increases fertility. Watermelon in a pregnant woman’s dream is abundant to earn a living from business or inheritance. Eating watermelon in a pregnant woman’s dream indicates good news and days full of kindness and blessings. If the watermelon in the dream is white, this will be an indication of freedom from illness. If she sees If a pregnant woman eats watermelon, the child will be a boy. If a pregnant woman has any problems, she will soon get rid of them. Seeing a yellow watermelon in a dream is welcome if a friend appears with her. Interpretation of seeing watermelon for a man: A man is lonely, when he sees watermelon in a dream, This indicates that his marriage is approaching. Seeing watermelon in a dream is evidence of a man’s survival on a large scale. Seeing watermelon in a dream Single people may see a lot of watermelon in their dreams and this vision promises a happy and peaceful life with their partner. In some places, this vision indicates major financial problems and crises. A bad psychological state is transmitted through it and affects the dreamer’s vision. White watermelon in a dream is a single man who enjoys abundant health in a dream, and picking watermelon in a dream is an imminent marriage. The interpretation of buying watermelon in a dream. Seeing watermelon in a dream varies from the situation

When a married woman sees a dark house, this may indicate her husband’s bad qualities, and God knows the unseen. Interpretation of dreams in our house. Condolences in a dream. title: Interpretation of wearing a neckwear in a dream for a single woman

preview.html: Here, dear reader, in this article, is the detailed interpretation of wearing an earring in a dream for an unmarried woman. The girl is one of the most sensitive, attractive, and soft creatures, and the clothes she wears reflect her feelings, morals, and culture. . . Because it has an impact on her femininity and gives an impression that carries concepts of beauty, what a girl wears is a mirror of her, while many girls wonder what it means to see a neck in a dream and what symbols it contains. So, an encyclopedia accompanies you on a tour to decipher this vision through this article that I present to you. Follow us. Interpretation of wearing a necklace in a dream for a single woman: The earring is considered one of the accessories that reflects a woman’s personality because of its charming softness that captivates hearts, while its shapes and types are varied in gold, silver, and plastic. The dream interpretation that said: Seeing a girl in a dream symbolizes that she is wearing a gold earring or earrings in her ears. To get married soon, and God knows best. Seeing an unmarried woman in her dream means that she is wearing an earring made of silver metal. This indicates her engagement to a man who fears her, and God knows best. As for an unmarried girl’s dream of sticking out her neck in a dream, it is one of those visions that do not bode well at all because it indicates the problems that haunt the girl in her life. Seeing the loss of an earring in a dream means that the girl’s relationship with her fiancé is threatened, or Perhaps the engagement will be canceled permanently, and God knows best. Seeing a girl losing her dream indicates the end of a romantic relationship she was in. Buying a necklace in a dream for a single woman. A girl can see in her dream that she is buying a new ring made of silver or gold. What do these visions symbolize and what connotations do they carry? ? An encyclopedia answers these questions through the following lines: The dream of buying an earring in a dream symbolizes a single woman who does not appreciate the blessings that God has given her, which exposes her to losing those blessings and gifts. As for wearing an earring only for testing and not for purchase? This indicates that the single woman will experience an engagement or enter into an emotional situation that will not work out in the end, and God knows best. Giving a necklace in a dream to a single woman. Seeing the gift of an earring in a dream for an unmarried woman has many connotations and symbols, so we highlight them through these following lines: Giving the right in a dream There are many meanings depending on its type. If it is made of gold, it indicates marriage, and if it is made of silver, it indicates engagement. While seeing the neck in an unmarried woman’s dream indicates the existence of a relationship, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. Interpretation of dreams for a gift of a golden earring for a single woman: seeing someone giving a girl a golden earring It has many interpretations, which we explain below: Seeing someone giving a gold earring as a gift in a dream means the honor, kindness, and support that the girl will receive. This dream may also indicate marriage soon, and God knows best. Through this article, we have examined the most obvious signs of seeing a dream. Earring in a dream, as narrated by dream interpretation scholars. To interpret dreams. Al-Naqid 1- Book of Kalam fi Interpretation of Dreams, Muhammad Ibn Sirin, Dar Al-Ma’rifa, Beirut, 200

title: Interpretation of milk and milk in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Milk and milk in a dream It is one of the most promising visions, especially since once it is mentioned it brings to mind goodness, purity and peace, which prompts the dreamer to search for what meanings and symbols this dream brings to him. Milk and milk in a dream Dreaming of milk in a dream indicates the blessing of money and the fulfillment of hopes, and it should One should thank God for this manna and generosity. The dream is a sign of good news and happy events that make him accept reality more than before. Seeing spilled milk is a sign of loss and loss of money that he sought a lot to obtain and gave a lot of time and effort to it. His appearance is defiled and defiled with dirt , as a sign of the vicissitudes of his life, and the crises that God hopes to escape from, because only he is in control of things. The interpretation indicates the long recovery of the patient after a long period of pain and misery. The interpretation symbolizes the opportunity that this person will have to travel as far as he hopes In reaching it and winning it. Milk and milk in a dream by Ibn Sirin. The interpretation according to the scholar Ibn Sirin includes a reference to the gains that this person reaps from the work he does or the appropriate work in which he excels. Eating milk and milk in a dream by Ibn Sirin, and the taste was sour, indicates His confusion and psychological imbalance and his need for the help of those around him to overcome this feeling and move to safety. The dream, if the milk is very hot, symbolizes the victory that he will obtain over any enemy or traitor that he believes will be achieved. The meaning, from another perspective, carries the sign of numerous crises That he goes through and the hours of torment that led him to the stage of losing hope, but he must be patient, as it is the key to comfort. Milk and milk in a single woman’s dream. Milk and milk in a dream express the woman’s liberation, beauty and femininity that makes her the center of everyone’s attention and admiration. The dream carries an indication of what she will get. From a beloved religious man who loves her and treats her well on the path of God and His Messenger. The meaning indicates the positive changes that are occurring in her life financially and professionally, and the changes and improvements that are occurring in her life. Seeing milk and milk in her dream is good news about the goals that she will reach and the ambitions and successes that she will achieve. For him, drinking it is also a sign of the abundance of food that falls on her and of the good news that it brings to her. Milk and milk in a dream for a married woman Milk and milk in a dream for a married woman carry many good omens. Interpretation in another house includes a reference to the relief of anxiety and the elimination of anxiety. Its abundant flow from her chest is evidence of unexpected blessings that she did not expect, and God knows best. Distributing milk to those around her is a sign of the good things she is doing and of her commitment to God in secret and in public. Drinking milk in her dream represents her married life and the general understanding and calm that surrounds her. In it.Milk and milk in a dream for a pregnant woman. A dream about milk and milk in a dream for a pregnant woman expresses that she is going through a healthy pregnancy period.
